mapper.select: select * from TMP_EM_CGPN where done_yn is null and #{hr_sn} > cgpn_hr_sn order by cgpn_hr_sn desc limit 1000
select * from TMP_EM_PBSVNT where done_yn is null and #{hr_sn} > cgpn_hr_sn order by cgpn_hr_sn desc limit 1000
select * from TMP_EM_VISIT where done_yn is null and #{hr_sn} > cgpn_hr_sn order by cgpn_hr_sn desc limit 1000
